name: ai-elearning-platform
description: Comprehensive AI-powered E-Learning Platform with automated lecture generation

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run server" "npm run client" "npm run ml-services"
scripts.build:client: cd client && npm install && npm run build
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd server && npm install && cd ../client && npm install && cd ../ml-services && pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.test: cd server && npm test && cd ../client && npm test
scripts.lint: cd server && npm run lint && cd ../client && npm run lint

author: Anvithshetty17
